attributes.action: re-think the decision to not "change the law to favour existing noise sources over new residents." and to protect the continuation of that activity and reject such complaints from local residents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In response to the PM's response to a recent petition 'Live With It'.

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17266

We urge the government to rethink this and to have our heritage back at the forefront of the British way of life. Motor racing circuits, along with other long standing facilities such as sports facilities and local airfields) not only a source of employment but are one of the leading sources of revenue for local economies and the national economy in this country.

Please support this petition to protect long established activities and venues.

Please see http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/livewithit/ for the original petition and the basis of this one.
